indicatorTemplateXML.author: Colcamex Resources Inc. for Oscar EMR

heading.name: Preventive Care Bonus: Childhood Immunization
heading.definition: Target population: consists of enrolled patients who are aged 30 to 42 months of age, inclusive as of March 31st of the fiscal year for which the bonus is being claimed. Service Period: by their 30th month of age. Service Codes reported: G538A, G539A, G688A, G689A, G840A, G841A, G844A, G845A, G846A, and G848A and tracking code Q132A
heading.framework: Based on and adapted from AFHTO D2D 3.0 Indicators: Data Dictionary version 4 (Nov 2015)

indicatorQuery.query:
SELECT -- count patients that satisfy all 6 requirements IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( IF( fin.dtap > 0 AND fin.pneu > 0 AND fin.rot > 0 AND fin.menc > 0 AND fin.mmr > 0 AND fin.vz > 0 , 1, 0 ) ) , 0 ) AS '% Eligible',
IF( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, COUNT(fin.patient) - SUM( IF( fin.dtap > 0 AND fin.pneu > 0 AND fin.rot > 0 AND fin.menc > 0 AND fin.mmr > 0 AND fin.vz > 0 , 1, 0 ) ) , 0 ) AS '% Ineligible'
FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS 'patient', IFNULL( DTaP.id, 0 ) AS 'dtap', IFNULL( PNEU.id, 0 ) AS 'pneu', IFNULL( ROT.id, 0 ) AS 'rot', IFNULL( MC.id, 0 ) AS 'menc', IFNULL( MM.id, 0 ) AS 'mmr', IFNULL( VZ.id, 0 ) AS 'vz' FROM demographic d
-- 4 instances of - DTaP-IPV-Hib - Diphtheria, Tetanus, Pertussis, Polio, Haemophilus influenzae type B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, MAX(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${dTaPIPVHib} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.id) >= 4 ) DTaP ON (d.demographic_no = DTaP.demographic_no)
-- 3 instances of - Pneu-C-13 - Pneumococcal Conjugate 13 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, MAX(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${pneumococcal} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.id) >= 3 ) PNEU ON (d.demographic_no = PNEU.demographic_no)
-- 2 instances of - Rot-1 - Rotavirus LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, MAX(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${rotavirus} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(p.id) >= 2 ) ROT ON (d.demographic_no = ROT.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - Men-C-C - Meningococcal Conjugate LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${meningococcal} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) MC ON (d.demographic_no = MC.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - MMR - Measles, Mumps, Rubella LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${measlesMumpsRubella} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) MM ON (d.demographic_no = MM.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - Var - Varicella LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${varicella} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 AND p.refused = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) VZ ON (d.demographic_no = VZ.demographic_no)
-- PATIENTS BETWEEN 30 TO 42 MONTHS OLD WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} -- the patient must have been rostered AND d.roster_status LIKE ${rosterstatus} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), ${upperLimit.date} ) / 365.25 ) BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.age} AND ${upperLimit.age} ) fin;

column.name: CASE WHEN IFNULL(DTaP.refused, 0) > 0 THEN 'refused' ELSE IFNULL( DTaP.id, 0 ) END
column.title: DTaP (4)

column.name: CASE WHEN IFNULL( PNEU.refused, 0) > 0 THEN 'refused' ELSE IFNULL( PNEU.id, 0 ) END
column.title: Pneu-C (3)

column.name: CASE WHEN IFNULL( ROT.refused, 0) > 0 THEN 'refused' ELSE IFNULL( ROT.id, 0 ) END
column.title: Rot (2)

column.name: CASE WHEN IFNULL( MC.refused, 0) > 0 THEN 'refused' ELSE IFNULL( MC.id, 0 ) END
column.title: MenC-C (1)

column.name: CASE WHEN IFNULL( MM.refused, 0) > 0 THEN 'refused' ELSE IFNULL( MM.id, 0 ) END
column.title: MMR (1)

column.name: CASE WHEN IFNULL( VZ.refused, 0) THEN 'refused' ELSE IFNULL( VZ.id, 0 ) END
column.title: VZ (1)

drillDownQuery.query:
SELECT * FROM demographic d
-- 4 instances of - DTaP-IPV-Hib - Diphtheria, Tetanus, Pertussis, Polio, Haemophilus influenzae type B LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id, MAX(p.refused) AS refused FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${dTaPIPVHib} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) DTaP ON (d.demographic_no = DTaP.demographic_no)
-- 3 instances of - Pneu-C-13 - Pneumococcal Conjugate 13 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id, MAX(p.refused) AS refused FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${pneumococcal} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) PNEU ON (d.demographic_no = PNEU.demographic_no)
-- 2 instances of - Rot-1 - Rotavirus LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id, MAX(p.refused) AS refused FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${rotavirus} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) ROT ON (d.demographic_no = ROT.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - Men-C-C - Meningococcal Conjugate LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id, MAX(p.refused) AS refused FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${meningococcal} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) MC ON (d.demographic_no = MC.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - MMR - Measles, Mumps, Rubella LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id, MAX(p.refused) AS refused FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${measlesMumpsRubella} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) MM ON (d.demographic_no = MM.demographic_no)
-- 1 instance of - Var - Varicella LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.demographic_no, COUNT(p.id) AS id, MAX(p.refused) AS refused FROM preventions p WHERE p.prevention_type LIKE ${varicella} AND p.prevention_date <= ${upperLimit.date} AND p.deleted = 0 GROUP BY p.demographic_no ) VZ ON (d.demographic_no = VZ.demographic_no)
-- TRACKING/EXCLUSION CODE USED. LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boc.demographic_no, MAX(boi.service_code) AS service_code, MAX(boi.service_date) AS service_date FROM billing_on_cheader1 boc INNER JOIN billing_on_item boi ON (boi.ch1_id = boc.id) WHERE boi.service_code LIKE ${trackingCode} AND boi.service_date <= ${upperLimit.date} GROUP BY boc.demographic_no ) TRACK ON (d.demographic_no = TRACK.demographic_no )
-- SERVICE CODE USED LEFT JOIN ( SELECT boc2.demographic_no, MAX(boi.service_code) AS service_code, MAX(boi.service_date) AS service_date FROM billing_on_item boi JOIN ( SELECT MAX(boi.ch1_id) AS id, boc.demographic_no FROM billing_on_item boi JOIN billing_on_cheader1 boc ON (boi.ch1_id = boc.id) WHERE boi.service_code IN ${serviceCode} AND boi.service_date <= ${upperLimit.date} GROUP BY boc.demographic_no ) boc2 ON( boc2.id = boi.id) ) BILL ON (d.demographic_no = BILL.demographic_no)
-- PATIENTS BETWEEN 30 TO 42 MONTHS OLD WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${pstatus} -- the patient must have been rostered AND d.roster_status LIKE ${rosterstatus} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE ${provider} AND ABS( DATEDIFF( DATE( CONCAT(d.year_of_birth,"-",d.month_of_birth,"-",d.date_of_birth) ), ${upperLimit.date} ) / 365.25 ) BETWEEN ${lowerLimit.age} AND ${upperLimit.age}
